special_text:
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast it until the end of your next turn.
[0]: Target creature gains prowess until end of turn.
[-3]: You may cast any number of copies of Flare Up.
rules_text2:
[i](Cast when you attack with a single creature.)[/i]
Flare Up deals 1 damage to any target.
